00001 /*
00002  *  maven Programming Language
00003  *  Created by Elliot Chance <elliot@chancemedia.com>.

00005 
00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"
00008 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00009 #include "struct_MavenObject.h"
00010 #include "errors.h"
00011 #include "namespaces.h"
00012 #include "scope.h"
00013 #include "objects.h"
00014 #include "operators.h"
00015 
00016 using namespace std;
00017 
00018 string keywordReturn(MavenCompiler* c, string line) {
00019         // we have to be in a function to use this
00020         if(c->currentFunction == "") {
00021                 pushError(c, "Can not return out of non-function");
00022                 return MAVEN_INVALID;
00023         }
00024         
00025         // it could be a void return
00026         if(line.length() == 6)
00027                 return "return";
00028         
00029         StringList types;
00030         MavenMutability mut;
00031         string newCode = dissectCode(c, line.substr(7, line.length() - 7), types, mut);
00032         
00033         // check the return type matches the function its in
00034         int nID = findNamespaceID(c, c->currentNamespace);
00035         int oID = findObjectID(c, nID, c->currentClass);
00036         for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->at(nID).objects->at(oID)->functions->length(); ++i) {
00037                 if(c->namespaces->at(nID).objects->at(oID)->functions->at(i).name == c->currentFunction) {
00038                         if(canCastBetween(c, types.join(","), c->namespaces->at(nID).objects->at(oID)->functions->at(i).returnType)) {
00039                                 return "return " + newCode;
00040                         } else {
00041                                 pushError(c, "Can not cast return type %s to %s", types.join(","),
00042                                                   c->namespaces->at(nID).objects->at(oID)->functions->at(i).returnType);
00043                                 return MAVEN_INVALID;
00044                         }
00045                 }
00046         }
00047         
00048         // if it gets to here something really bad has gone wrong
00049         return MAVEN_INVALID;
00050 }
